title-english: Bint Al Nil Union at the Opera House
creator: Shafik, Doria
description-english: This article is about a theatrical performance organized by the Bint Al Nil Union at the Cairo Opera House. Proceeds from the play were to be used to fund school all over Egypt. The play was extremely successful.
description-arabic: تتحدث المقالة عن حفلة تمثيلية أقامها اتحاد بنت النيل بدار الأوبرا المصرية، حيث تم تخصيص ريع الحفل لإنشاء المدارس في كافة أنحاء الجمهورية. وقد لاقى الحفل نجاحًا كبيرًا.
subject: Women's rights -- Egypt; Women -- Arab countries -- Periodicals
source: From: Bint Al Nil Union at the Opera House
rights: Women and Memory Forum are copyright holders of the Bint al-Nil Journal Collection.
